title: Say hello to Utopia No. 8—the adorable new social MMORPG from Happy Tomato
description: Utopia No. 8, a social MMORPG from Taiwanese developers Happy Tomato, is launching a crowdfunding project via Kickstarter and encouraging players to dive into their Planet Relocation Project to help shape the future of their upcoming game. Players can create their own Utoker and farm, decorate a house, and socialize with other players over karaoke and games in this adorable chibi-style life simulator’s audio and video rooms.
